title: Heart attacks increasingly common in young adults

title_detail.value: Heart attacks increasingly common in young adults

summary: Even though fewer heart attacks are occurring in the US -- in large part due to the use of medications like statins and a decline in smoking -- these events are steadily rising in very young adults. New data not only validate this trend but also reveal that more heart attacks are striking those under age 40.
